roleset.name: holding back

example.name: arg1
example.text: The option as voluntary will at least not require quotas and enforcement through violent means -LRB- beatings -RRB- or witholding of priveledges like food , bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight and isolation . -LRB- legislativ brutality encouragement -RRB-
example.arg: of priveledges like food, bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight
